lead_paragraph: Atlantic City, New Jersey's struggling gambling hub, will get a short-term $40 million loan from the state rather than try to borrow the money in the capital markets this year, a city official said on Tuesday.

headline.main: New Jersey to Bail Out Atlantic City With Short-Term Loan
headline.print_headline: New Jersey to Bail Out Atlantic City With Short-Term Loan
